      === Future Monthly Return Bound (Monitoring) ===
      Lower Bound (monthly, 99% confidence): -1.29621900%    [Block length L = 4]
      What this means: With about 99% confidence, any future month is expected to be no worse than -1.29621900%.
      How we estimated it: We used a block bootstrap with L = 4 to respect typical month-to-month dependence.
